Title: Building the Coolest Console Apps in .NET
Author: Nick Chapsas
Description:
Check out my courses on Dometrain: https://dometrain.com/courses/?ref=nick-chapsas&promo=youtube Download the code here: https://mailchi.mp/dometrain/1c1gtrm7bb4 Subscribe to my newsletter: https://nickchapsas.com

Hello, everybody. I'm Nick, and in this video, I will show you how to build the coolest consoles in .NET using a library called RazorConsole. RazorConsole uses razor pages and turns them into console applications which is a very fun way to build console apps.

Give RazorConsole a star on GitHub: https://github.com/LittleLittleCloud/RazorConsole
